imdb.plot outline: 'BENCHED' is a one-hour original scripted comedy-drama about a reluctant, recently appointed judge who is not quite ready to give up his life as bachelor to begin a new life as a public servant. Each week, he confronts the underbelly of the criminal justice system that has derailed a generation of African Americans, including those close to him - as he upholds the tenets of the same system.
imdb.title: Benched
